'''McDonald's Add-On''' is an [[add-on]] promoting the {{AMCM|McDonald's|McDonald's x A Minecraft Movie}} collaboration which was obtained by purchasing the adult ''A Minecraft Movie Meal'' through the McDonald's app and opting into emails in the app's settings. The add-on code would be sent via email after a meal is purchased. Two million qualifying purchases could be given the add-on. The add-on ceased distribution on May 6, 2025.

== Additions ==
{{Expand section|Additions description}}
=== Items ===
* [[File:Written Book.gif|40px|class=pixel-image]] McDonald's Guide
** Guides the [[player]] the Add-On info.
** Appears in the player's inventory when entering the world.
* [[File:Soda Potion.png|40px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Soda Potion Render.png|40px]] Soda Potion
** Gives [[speed]] and [[jump boost]] effects to player by drinking and also mobs that are nearby take off for a few seconds.
* [[File:Big Mac.png|40px|class=pixel-image]] Big Mac
** Can be eaten.
* [[File:French Fries.png|40px|class=pixel-image]] French Fries 
** Can be eaten.
* [[File:McNuggets.png|40px|class=pixel-image]] McNuggets
** Can be eaten.
* [[File:Nether Flame Sauce.png|40px|class=pixel-image]] Nether Flame Sauce
** When eaten, leaves a fiery trail behind the player for several seconds, similar to the Lava Chicken item in the [[Lava Chicken Add-On]].
*  [[File:Grimace Shake.png|40px|class=pixel-image]] Grimace Shake
** Gives to player [[speed]] and [[regeneration]] effects.
* [[File:Spatula.png|40px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Spatula Render.png|40px]] Spatula
* [[File:Burger Crystal.png|40px|class=pixel-image]] Burger Crystal
** Can be eaten.
* [[File:Birdie Wings.png|40px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Birdie Wings Render.png|40px]] Birdie Wings
** Gives to player [[slow falling]] effect if worn.
** When activated the player can fly similarly to flying in creative mode while simultaneously being propelled forward in the air.
* [[File:McDonald's Crew Hat.png|40px|class=pixel-image]][[File:McDonald's Crew Hat Render.png|40px]] McDonald's Crew Cap
** Can be worn.
* [[File:McDonald's Crew Apron.png|40px|class=pixel-image]][[File:McDonald's Crew Apron Render.png|40px]] McDonald's Crew Apron
** Can be worn.
* [[File:Fry Pack.png|40px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Fry Pack Render.png|40px]] Fry Pack
** Can be worn.
** Gives the [[player]] Protection effect

=== Blocks ===
* [[File:Golden Box.png|40px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Golden Box Render.png|40px]] Golden Box
** When destroyed, it drops McDonald's Add-On items or spawns random McDonald's Add-On mob.
* [[File:Burger Bud2.png|40px|class=pixel-image]] Burger Bud
* [[File:Burger Bud.png|40px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Burger Bud Render.png|40px]] Small Burger Crystal 
* [[File:Small Burger Crystal.png|40px|class=pixel-image]] [[File:Small Burger Crystal Render.png|40px]] Medium Burger Crystal
* [[File:Medium Burger Crystal.png|40px|class=pixel-image]][[File:Medium Burger Crystal Render.png|40px]] Burger Cluster
* [[File:Grimace Egg Render.png|40px]] Grimace Egg
** Crafted with [[Egg]] and [[Purple Dye]].
** Spawns Grimace by clicking.
;All burger crystals variations can be naturally spawned in the world, and when destroyed drops several burger crystals.

=== Mobs ===
* {{animate|Grimace Skin Render.png;Grimace Scared.png;Grimace Surprised.png;Grimace Angry.png;Grimace Sleepy.png|40px}} Grimace 
** Passive mob.
** Attacks Big Mac Cubes and Zombie Hamburglars.
** Has different facial expressions.
* [[File:Zombie Hamburglar Mob Render.png|40px]] Zombie Hamburglar
** Hostile mob.
** Can be naturally spawned in the world at night.
* [[File:Hamburglar Golem Render.png|40px]] Hamburglar Golem 
** Neutral mob.
** Attacks hostile mobs and Big Mac Cubes.
* [[File:Birdie Chicken Render.png|40px]] Birdie Chicken
** Can be naturally spawned in the world.
** Drops several McNuggets when killed.
** Lays McNuggets instead of eggs
* [[File:Big Mac Cube Render.png|40px]] Big Mac Cube
** Hostile mob.
** Drops big mac when killed.
** Can be naturally spawned in the world.
